author: Patrick Clark
comment: love the way it is supposed to look on the picture but the face is terribly aligned on my moto360 running Lollipop 5.1.1

author: Devon Shankar
comment: Doesn't fit for Moto 360 after 5.1.1 update for all your watch face apps.  It used to fit. Was worthy of 5 stars before

author: Anthony Do
comment: This is an okay face for my LG Urbane. I would have liked it to be slightly sharper in appearance. It seems a little fuzzy.
title: Okay face
